content: TE 3-C Rotary hammer Powerful pistol-grip, triple-mode SDS Plus (TE-C) rotary hammer with chipping function ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Rotary hammers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Triple-mode SDS Plus (TE-C) rotary hammer – for hammer drilling, rotary-only drilling and chiseling 850W motor provides high performance and overload protection Quick-change TE-C Click chuck and user-friendly selector switch for high working convenience 360° side handle with quick-set depth gauge – easily adjustable for a firm grip in any position, even in tight spaces Electronic switch for precise hole-starting Applications Drilling and hammer drilling in concrete and masonry Corrective chiseling and light channel chasing in concrete and masonry Occasional drilling in wood and steel using the optional smooth-shank chuck adapter Cutting socket recesses in masonry Driving screws using optional bit holders ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 6.6 lb. Optimum Hammer drilling range: 1/4 - 5/8 in Single impact energy: 1.8 ft-lbs Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 6.6 lb | Optimum Hammer drilling range | 1/4 - 5/8 in | Single impact energy | 1.8 ft-lbs | Working mode | Hammer drilling, Chiseling, Drilling, Chisel setting | Hammer drilling diameter range | 5/32 - 1-3/32 in | Hammer drilling RPM | 1070 rpm | Full hammering frequency | 5160 impacts/minute | Functionality | Reverse mode, Depth gauge, Chipping | Triaxial vibration value for hammer drilling into concrete (ah,HD) | 15.4 m/s² | 1 | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 11.4 m/s² | 2 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 95 dB (A) | 3 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 14.8 x 3.5 x 8 mm | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3553168 - TE 3-C starter package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 3-C 120V New Rotary hammer - 1x TE 3-C Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-C 3/16-6 - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-C 1/4-6 - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-C 3/8-12 - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-C 1/2-12 - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-C 5/8-8 - 1x Flat chisel TE-CX FM 25 - 1x Scaling chisel TE-CX SC 25/6 - 3951469 - TE 3-C Performance Package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 3-C 120V New Rotary hammer - 1x TE 3-C Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE-CX 3/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4- 4 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 3/8-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX(5) 1/2-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 5/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x Flat chisel TE-CX FM 18 - 1x Pointed chisel TE-CX SM 18
